summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2006, for the improvement of Thirtieth Avenue South, from Dearborn Street to Norman Street, in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers, side sewers and water mains of proper dimensions and materials, together with all wyes, gates, tees and crosses and other appurtenances necessary for the proper drainage and water service of said district; under Ordinance No. 20411, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
